SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Order Product Tax Line Item Summary Fields

The Order Product Tax Line Item Summary object represents the current state of tax on an order product summary or an order product adjustment line item summary. Multiple order product tax summaries can apply to one order product summary or order product adjustment summary.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Order Product Tax Line Item Summary object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Amount	The amount of tax represented by the order product tax line item summary.
Description	The description of the order product tax line item summary.
Name	The name of the order product tax line item summary.
Order Product Adjustment Line Item Summary	

The order product adjustment line item summary to which the order product tax line item summary applies.

If the field is blank, the order product tax line item summary applies to an order product summary.


Order Product Summary	

The ID of the order product summary to which the order product tax line item summary applies.

For tax on an order product summary, this value is the ID of the order product summary
For tax on an adjustment, this value is the ID of the order product summary to which the adjustment applies.

Order Summary	The order summary associated with the order product summary or the order product adjustment line item summary for the order product tax line item summary.
Original Order Product Tax Line Item	

The original order product tax line item associated with the order product tax line item summary.

For unmanaged order summaries, this field is blank.


Rate	The tax rate used to calculate the amount for the order product tax line item summary.
Tax Effective Date	The date on which the amount for the order product tax line item summary was calculated.
Type	Indicates whether the amount for the order product tax line item summary is actual or estimated.
